sentences.en: "You must come to Tinsley's graduation party." — "I'd be delighted."
sentences.cn: “你一定要来参加廷斯利的毕业聚会。”——“我很乐意。”

sentences.en: Conrad Black gave an excellent party that surpassed expectations.
sentences.cn: 康拉德·布莱克举办了一次远超人们预期的精彩聚会。

sentences.en: Didn't I see you at the party last week?
sentences.cn: 我在上周的聚会上见过你，对不对？

sentences.en: He had very kindly asked me to the cocktail party that evening.
sentences.cn: 他很客气地邀请我参加那晚的鸡尾酒会。

sentences.en: I gave a dinner party for a few close friends.
sentences.cn: 我为几个密友办了晚宴。

sentences.en: I have always voted for the Labour Party.
sentences.cn: 我一直投工党的票。

sentences.en: It was going to be a party to end all parties.
sentences.cn: 这将成为最棒的聚会。

sentences.en: Poor Jane was in rather a spin about the party.
sentences.cn: 可怜的简对这次聚会真有些不知所措。

sentences.en: Scores of people tried desperately to gatecrash the party.
sentences.cn: 很多不速之客拼命想要挤进这个聚会。

sentences.en: The house is in a mess after a wild party.
sentences.cn: 狂欢聚会后，屋里一片狼藉。

sentences.en: the manipulations I'd been party to.
sentences.cn: 我曾经参与过的那些操作。

sentences.en: The party had been overlaid with a certain nervousness.
sentences.cn: 这个聚会一直笼罩在不安的气氛中。

sentences.en: The party had been to the grouse moors that morning.
sentences.cn: 这群人那天上午去了松鸡猎场。

sentences.en: the party spirit
sentences.cn: 参加社交聚会的乐趣

sentences.en: The poor priest was plied with drink at a dinner party.
sentences.cn: 宴会上不断有人给可怜的牧师灌酒。

sentences.en: They come to eat and drink, to swim, to party.
sentences.cn: 他们来吃饭、喝酒、游泳，尽情欢乐。

sentences.en: We’re having a small party this evening to celebrate our wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 我们今晚有个小聚会，庆祝我们的结婚纪念日。

sentences.en: Would they trash the place when the party was over?
sentences.cn: 聚会结束时他们会把这地方搞得一团糟吗？

sentences.en: You don't have to get dressed up for this party.
sentences.cn: 你没必要为这次聚会而着盛装。

sentences.en: You're quite a party animal aren't you, out there every night.
sentences.cn: 你就是为派对而生的，不是吗，每天晚上你都去参加派对。

trans.tran_cn: 社交聚会，党，党派，当事人，同类，伙伴
trans.tran_en: a social event when a lot of people meet together to enjoy themselves by eating, drinking, dancing etc
a social event when a lot of people meet together to enjoy themselves by eating, drinking, dancing etc

trans.tran_cn: 为…举行社交聚会，为…请客，参加社交聚会
trans.tran_en: If you party, you enjoy yourself doing things such as going out to parties, drinking, dancing, and talking to people.
